info.name: LoadingReadyRun - WCMLG Colours (Forum Only)
info.description: Changes the LoadingReadyRun forums to a colour-scheme to show support for the West-Coast Mother-Lovin' G's.
info.additionalInfo:
Features:
Changes spoiler text colour in order to keep it hidden. (Doesn't work on text that has been coloured by the user).
Expands main window, pushing advertising off to the side.
Doesn't break any of the forum images or give them strange background colours (But the colours do clash)

Version 1.0
Initial release.
